simpleCounter

Class FastCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpleCounter.CounterModel
      • simpleCounter.FastCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class FastCounter
extends CounterModel

    • Constructor Detail

      • FastCounter

        public FastCounter()
        Default constructor for FastCounter. Creates a new CounterModel with modulus 15 and seting the step to 5.

      • FastCounter

        public FastCounter(int modulus,
           int step)
        Generates a new FastCounter with a specified step and modulus.
        Parameters:
        modulus - - Gets sent to the superclass where it creates a new instance of CounterModel with this modulus.
        step - - Tells the upMany and downMany methods how much it should increase the instances value with.

    • Method Detail

      • upMany

        public void upMany()
        Increases the value of the instance with the amount of steps that was specified in the object in the constructor.

      • downMany

        public void downMany()
        Decreses the value of the instance with the amount of steps that was specified in the object in the constructor.

      • getStep

        public int getStep()
        A getter for the value of steps the specified object has.
        Returns:
        step for the specified instance.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        A equals method for two instances of FastCounter. Makes sure that value, modulus and step are identical and if they are the method will return true. If they are not, it will return false.
        Overrides:
        equals in class CounterModel

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Generates a string containing Value, Stepa and Modulus for the object.
        Overrides:
        toString in class CounterModel
